Posts.Content: Feb 1, 2018 03:15AM Jenaus1 wrote: I was on 4 rounds of AC, then 12 of Taxol. I noticed the lump literally disappear after the second AC infusion. Please let us know how you get on after the next chemo treatment. Wishing you the best SkiChick86 from Melbourne, Aust. Jen
Posts.Title: How soon after chemo did you feel a change in lump size? SkiChick86 NotVeryBrave
